name: Giant Poisonous Snake
description: A massive serpent over 20 feet long with venomous fangs.
memorable: Its venom can paralyze or kill small to medium-sized creatures.
goals: To ambush and prey on unsuspecting creatures.
relations: Typically found alone or in pairs, can be related to other serpents.
environment: Jungles, swamps, or dense wilderness areas.
strengths: Excellent ambush predator with good agility and venomous attacks.
weaknesses: Low hit points, making it susceptible to damage.
attacks: Bite attack that deals piercing damage and venom damage on a failed Constitution save.
most_powerful_ability: Delivers significant poison damage if the target fails to resist.
senses: Possesses blindsight to detect prey within 10 feet.
skills: Has proficiency in Perception, enhancing its tracking abilities.
additional_information: Can blend into its surroundings to become difficult to spot.
Utilizes swift movements to evade attacks.
Employs constricting abilities in addition to its bite.
Uses ambush tactics to ensure successful strikes.
test_queries: large venomous snake in the jungle
fast swimming snake with deadly bite
